comment: Gave students everything they needed to excel in the class. Not the most vibrant guy, but hey, it's a math class. Very open to questions, gave very clear explanations with real-life scenarios. Would take his classes again.

Mrs. Graham is GREAT- I'm not good at Algebra and I don't enjoy it, this is my 4th time taking the class, and with her help I passed with a C! My best advice is to GO TO CLASS and DO YOUR HOMEWORK... you have to work at it, but she'll get you through it!
